name: outlook-notifier
title: Outlook Notifier
description: Displays how much unread messages you have in your outlook webmail
author: Lefebvre Arnaud

preferences.name: refresh_schedule
preferences.title: Refresh schedule
preferences.description: How often the addon checks for mails (in seconds)

preferences.name: start_delay
preferences.title: Start delay
preferences.description: How much seconds the extension will wait to fetch messages after firefox's load

preferences.name: show_changelog
preferences.title: Show changelog
preferences.description: Show changelog in a new tab when addon just got updated

preferences.name: display_notifications
preferences.title: Display desktop notifications
preferences.description: A desktop popup will display informations about unread messages. This may not work on some Operating Systems

preferences.name: play_notification_sound
preferences.title: Play a sound for notifications
preferences.description: Play or not a sound when a notification pop up
